name: Link Sticker
body:
Photo:

```python
>>> from instagrapi import Client
>>> from instagrapi.types import StoryLink

>>> cl = Client(proxy='http://123.123.123.123:40007')
>>> cl.load_settings('/tmp/dump.json')

>>> cl.photo_upload_to_story("/tmp/tmpg133wsw2.mp4.jpg", "", links=[StoryLink(webUri="http://adw0rd.com")])
```

Video:

```python
>>> from instagrapi import Client
>>> from instagrapi.types import StoryLink
>>> from instagrapi.story import StoryBuilder

>>> cl = Client(proxy='http://123.123.123.123:40007')
>>> cl.load_settings('/tmp/dump.json')

>>> link = StoryLink(webUri="http://adw0rd.com")
>>> buildout = StoryBuilder("/tmp/tmptsktx_j6.mp4", "Test").video(5, link=link.webUri)
Moviepy - Building video /tmp/tmpxf3x57e8.mp4.
Moviepy - Writing video /tmp/tmpxf3x57e8.mp4

Moviepy - Done !
Moviepy - video ready /tmp/tmpxf3x57e8.mp4

>>>  cl.video_upload_to_story(buildout.path, "", stickers=buildout.stickers)
Analizing video file "/tmp/tmpxf3x57e8.mp4"
Generating thumbnail "/tmp/tmpxf3x57e8.mp4.jpg"...

Story(pk='2737326000305270904', id='2737326000305270904_29817608135', code='CX8736KovB4', ....
```

name: See Post
body:
Added link to a post in story
https://github.com/adw0rd/instagrapi/issues/412

name: Highlights
body: Added HighlightMixin (highlight_info, highlight_pk_from_url, extract_highlight_v1), ClientHighlightTestCase and docs

name: Support TOTP 2FA
body:
Added TOTP, TOTPMixin and TOTPTestCase
https://adw0rd.github.io/instagrapi/usage-guide/totp.html

name: New authorization
body: Support login_by_sessionid and Authorization header

name: Authorization header
body: Switched to a new authorization mechanism (from cookies to Authorization header)

name: set_country/set_locale
body:
Added cl.set_country
Added cl.set_locale
And update Instagram App version to 194.0.0.36.172

name: Archive, Hide and Delete
body:
Several method for Media, Direct Thread and Comment:

* media_archive
* media_unarchive
* direct_thread_hide
* comment_bulk_delete

name: Support 2FA
body:
* `login(username, password, verification_code='<CODE>')`
* TwoFactorRequired exception

name: direct_thread_by_participants
body:
Added search thread by user_id
`cl.direct_thread_by_participants([user_id])`

name: Media likers
body: Added `cl.media_likers(media_id) -> List[UserShort]`

name: Mark a story as seen
body: Added cl.story_seen([story_pk, ...], [skipped_story_pk, ...])

name: Story/Stickers
body: Added STorySticker type and method for upload area markup (as static_models) to instagram

name: StoryLocation
body: Tag location to story

name: Story/Hashtags
body: Support hashtags (StoryHashtag) when upload a story

name: StoryMixin
body:
StoryMixin
ClientStoryTestCase

name: Comment
body: Added CommentMixin, comment_like/unlike and ClientCommentTestCase

name: Like/Unlike
body: Support media like and unlike

name: Hashtag
body: Get Hashtag Info and Medias (Top/Recent)

name: Edit Account
body:
Added getting full profile information of an authorized user (e.g. email, phone_number, birthday and )
Added support for account editing (e.g. external_url, phone_number, username, full_name, biography, email)
Added changing account photo

name: Validation
body:
Support for types (pydantic) instead of dictionaries (Media, Resource, MediaOembed, Account, User, UserShort, Usertag, Location, Collection, Comment, DirectThread, DirectMessage)
Redesigned data retrieval (extractors)
Validation of input and output data (annotations and typing)

name: Support GEO
body:
Getting GEO from Media
The ability to set GEO when publishing posts (video, photo, album. IGTV) to the feed
